T02D2504:202a-1: badzra dh'a tu ma h'a mandala de ba sarba bya basth'a na n'a ma /
T02D2504:202a-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2504:202a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2504:202a-5: 'dod chags zha sdang la sogs pa //
T02D2504:202a-6: rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D2504:202a-7: sku ni bde bas kun nas gang //
T02D2504:202a-10: phyag rgya chen po rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02D2504:202a-11: rdor dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02D2504:202a-12: rnam par gzhag pa bdag gis bri //
T02D2504:202a-13: de la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma ma lus pa dang bral ba nyid de /
T02D2504:202a-14: de las gzhan pa'i khyad par can gyi rgyur gyur
T02D2504:202a-15: pa nyid kyis na me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D2504:202b-0: dbye ba @202b ma lus pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
T02D2504:202b-1: ba nyid kyis na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
T02D2504:202b-3: phyin ci log ma lus pa dang bral ba'i rang
T02D2504:202b-4: bzhin nyid kyis na so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2504:202b-6: 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan pa skyed pa'i
T02D2504:202b-7: rgyur gyur pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2504:202b-9: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis dang bral
T02D2504:202b-10: bas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2504:202b-12: de bas na me long lta bu'i ye shes la
T02D2504:202b-13: sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yang de nyid yin pas
T02D2504:202b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nga bo nyid yin no
T02D2504:202b-15: // de nyid ni nye bar dmigs pa rnams las
T02D2504:202b-16: ldog pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can yin
T02D2504:202b-17: pa'i phyir rdo rje sems ma'o //
T02D2504:202b-18: mtshan ma lus pa las ldog cing mtshan ma med pa'i bdag nyid can ni rin chen sems ma'o //
T02D2504:202b-19: log pa'i rmi lam las ldog cing smon pa med
T02D2504:202b-20: pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na chos kyi sems
T02D2504:202b-21: ma'o // phyin ci log gi smon par byed pa
T02D2504:202b-22: las bzlog cing mngon par 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D2504:202b-23: yin pas na las kyi sems ma'o //
T02D2504:202b-24: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa rigs kyi yum
T02D2504:202b-25: bzhi ni go rims bzhin du stong pa nyid la
T02D2504:202b-26: sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo
T02D2504:202b-28: de bzhin du de nyid ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi mthar rtog pa las ldog cing /
T02D2504:202b-29: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2504:202b-30: gyur pa byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i rgyur gyur
T02D2504:202b-31: pas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2504:202b-32: mig la sogs pa nye par dmigs pa las ldog
T02D2504:202b-33: cing nang stong ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2504:202b-34: gyur pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
T02D2504:202b-35: rnams 'gugs pa'i rgyur gyur pas rdo rje rgyal po'o
T02D2504:202b-36: gyur pa dang / // gzugs la sogs pa nye
T02D2504:202b-37: bar dmigs pa las ldog pas phyi stong pa nyid
T02D2504:202b-38: kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang /
T02D2504:202b-39: dgug pa rnams kyi rjes su chags pa'i rgyur gyur bas rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02D2504:202b-40: phyi nang gi skye mched dang lus dang gnas su
T02D2504:202b-41: nye bar dmigs pa las bzlog pas phyi nang stong
T02D2504:202b-42: pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang
T02D2504:202b-43: / chags par gyur pa'i sems kyi yid bde ba skyed par 'gyur pas rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2504:202b-44: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i bag chags kyi gnas
T02D2504:203a-0: yongs su gyur pa dag gis me long lta @203a
T02D2504:203a-1: * // bu'i ye shes de'i rgyur gyur pa chen
T02D2504:203a-2: po stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi'i ngo bo
T02D2504:203a-3: nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yin
T02D2504:203a-4: * // no // stong pa nyid du nye bar
T02D2504:203a-5: dmigs pa las ldog pas stong ba nyid stong pa
T02D2504:203a-6: nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang /
T02D2504:203a-7: byang chub kyi sems mngon par 'phel ba rnams kyi
T02D2504:203a-8: rgyal mtshan du dbang bskur ba'i rgyur gyur bas rdo
T02D2504:203a-10: don dam par nye bar dmigs pa las ldog cing
T02D2504:203a-11: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid du
T02D2504:203a-12: gyur pa dang dbang bskur ba rnyed pa rnams la
T02D2504:203a-13: mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2504:203a-14: du gzi brjid kyi rgyur gyur pas rdo rje gzi
T02D2504:203a-15: brjid do // 'dus byas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
T02D2504:203a-16: su nye bar dmigs pa las ldog pas 'dus byas
T02D2504:203a-17: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa
T02D2504:203a-18: brjid do // dang / gzi byin thob pa rnams
T02D2504:203a-19: la byams pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyur gyur pas rdo
T02D2504:203a-20: brjid do // dang / rje dpal lo // 'dus
T02D2504:203a-21: ma byas pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi nye bar
T02D2504:203a-22: dmigs pa las ldog pas 'dus ma byas stong ba
T02D2504:203a-23: nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang /
T02D2504:203a-24: byams pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i mtshan nyid rnams la
T02D2504:203a-25: chos kyi sbyin pa bla na med pa'i yid bde
T02D2504:203a-26: ba'i rgyur gyur pas na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02D2504:203a-27: nyon mongs ba can gyi yid gnas gyur ba nyid
T02D2504:203a-28: kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de'i phyin ci
T02D2504:203a-29: log spong ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rkyen du gyur
T02D2504:203a-30: bas stong ba nyid la sogs pa bzhi'i ngo bo
T02D2504:203a-31: nyid ni rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi
T02D2504:203a-32: yin no // sgro btags pa dang skur ba btab
T02D2504:203a-33: ba'i mthar nye bar dmigs pa las ldog pas shin
T02D2504:203a-34: tu stong pa nyid du gyur pa dang ;
T02D2504:203a-35: chos kyi sbyin pa la yid bde ba la zhugs
T02D2504:203a-36: pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin skyed pa'i rgyur gyur
T02D2504:203a-37: pas na rdo rje chos so //
T02D2504:203a-38: 'khor ba dmigs pa las ldog pas thog ma dang
T02D2504:203a-39: tha ma med pa stong ba nyid can du gyur
T02D2504:203a-40: pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa rnams kyi
T02D2504:203a-41: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes skyed pa'i rgyur
T02D2504:203a-42: gyur pas rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2504:203a-43: dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba'i nye bar
T02D2504:203a-44: dmigs pa las ldog pas dor ba med pa stong
T02D2504:203a-45: ba nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang
T02D2504:203a-46: / chos kyi 'khor lor zhugs pa de rnams gdul
T02D2504:203a-47: bya'i skye bo rnams kyi ngor chos ston du 'jug
T02D2504:203a-48: pa'i rgyur gyur pas rdo rje smra ba'o //
T02D2504:203b-0: yid kyi rnam par shes pa @203b gnas gyur pa'i
T02D2504:203b-1: ngo bo nyid kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2504:203b-2: ji skad du bshad pa'i phyin ci log las rnam
T02D2504:203b-3: par dben pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de'i 'khor du
T02D2504:203b-4: gyur pas shin tu stong pa nyid la sogs pa
T02D2504:203b-5: bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa ni rdo rje
T02D2504:203b-6: chos la sogs pa nyid do //
T02D2504:203b-7: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa chos kyi
T02D2504:203b-8: skur nye bar dmigs pa las ldog pa'i chos thams
T02D2504:203b-9: cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur
T02D2504:203b-10: ba dang / don dam pa'i stong pa nyid skal
T02D2504:203b-11: ba can rnams kyi rgyur gyur pas na rdo rje
T02D2504:203b-12: ba dang / las so // rang dang spyi'i mtshan
T02D2504:203b-13: nyid nye bar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid las ldog pa'i
T02D2504:203b-14: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D2504:203b-16: las la rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyi bsdu ba'i rgyur gyur pas rdo rje srung ba'o //
T02D2504:203b-17: nye bar dmigs pa med pa dang nye bar dmigs
T02D2504:203b-18: pa las ldog pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
T02D2504:203b-19: kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa dang srung pa
T02D2504:203b-20: la sogs pa rnams kyi bgegs zhi bar byed pas
T02D2504:203b-22: dngos bo med pa las bzlog pas dngos po med
T02D2504:203b-23: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D2504:203b-25: de ltar bya bsgrub pa 'jug ba rnams sku gsung
T02D2504:203b-26: thugs rdo rje byed pas dngos grub thams cad rdzogs
T02D2504:203b-27: pa'i rgyur gyur pas na rdo rje khu tshur ro
T02D2504:203b-28: // mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gnas
T02D2504:203b-29: gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bya ba grub pa'i
T02D2504:203b-30: ye shes ji skad du bshad pa'i phyin ci log
T02D2504:203b-31: rnams las dben pa'i ngo bo nyid de'i 'khor du
T02D2504:203b-32: gyur pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sogs
T02D2504:203b-33: pa'i ngo bo nyid de rdo rje la sogs pa'o
T02D2504:203b-34: // // de bzhin du ser sna dang /
T02D2504:203b-37: le lo la sogs pa'i nye bar dmigs pa las ldog cing /
T02D2504:203b-38: de'i gnyen po nyid kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang /
T02D2504:203b-39: btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2504:203b-40: can du gyur pas phyag rgya chen po gnyis su
T02D2504:203b-41: med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rnal
T02D2504:203b-42: 'byor gyi dbang phyug de ni gsang ba'i mchod pa
T02D2504:203b-43: bzhi'i ngo bo nyid de rdo rje sgeg mo dang
T02D2504:203b-44: / phreng ba dang glu ma dang gar ma'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2504:203b-45: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa ni sbyin pa'i
T02D2504:203b-46: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas
T02D2504:203b-47: na de bzhin du shes rab 'chal pa dang /
T02D2504:204a-1: log pa'i nga rgyal dang thabs med pa las log
T02D2504:204a-2: pas shes rab dang bsam gtan dang smon lam dang
T02D2504:204a-3: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D2504:204a-4: du gyur pa'i phyag rgya chen po gnyis su med
T02D2504:204a-5: pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dbang phyug
T02D2504:204a-6: de nyid ni phyi'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje
T02D2504:204a-7: bdug pa dang me tog dang mar me dang dri'i
T02D2504:204a-9: rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa rim pa
T02D2504:204a-10: bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2504:204a-11: la sogs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2504:204a-12: de nyid theg pa chen po la sogs pa la
T02D2504:204a-13: yid ches pas ma dad pa las ldog pas dad
T02D2504:204a-14: pa'i bdag nyid can de thab chen po'i ngo bo
T02D2504:204a-15: nyid yin pas rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D2504:204a-16: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa las ldog pa'i
T02D2504:204a-17: brtson 'grus kyi bdag nyid can gyi spyod pa'i ngo
T02D2504:204a-18: ngo nyid du gyur pas na rdo rje zhags pa'o
T02D2504:204a-19: // brjed ngas pa las ldog cing dran pa'i bdag
T02D2504:204a-20: can du gcod pa'i dgos pa las ldog pa'i bdag
T02D2504:204a-21: nyid can yin pas na rdo rje lcags sgrog go
T02D2504:204a-22: // // chos rnams mi shes pa las ldog pa'i
T02D2504:204a-23: ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid can yin zhing chos
T02D2504:204a-24: thams cad ma skyes par ston pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2504:204a-25: du gyur pas na rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2504:204a-26: des na thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2504:204a-27: gyi rnal 'byor chen po de nyid ni dad pa
T02D2504:204a-28: dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D2504:204a-29: gyi ngo bor gyur pas na rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D2504:204a-30: la sogs pa'o // sa'i go rims nges pa gang
T02D2504:204a-31: zhe na tshogs kyi lam du byang chub tu sems
T02D2504:204a-32: skyed pa dang gdams dga' 'bogs pa'o //
T02D2504:204a-33: sbyor ba'i lam du de kho na nyid la rjes
T02D2504:204a-34: su chags pa skyed pa dang rjes su chags pa'i
T02D2504:204a-36: mthong ba'i lam du chos kyi mthong ba rgyun mi 'chad bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2504:204a-37: sa gnyis pa la dbang mi 'phrogs par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa skyed pa'o //
T02D2504:204a-38: sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' de la bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs rje'i dbang gis ;
T02D2504:204a-39: byams pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2504:204a-40: sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa'i de la
T02D2504:204a-41: bde bar gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro
T02D2504:204a-42: // lnga pa la chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid ting nge gyi stobs so //
T02D2504:204a-43: drug pa la ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes skyed do//
T02D2504:204b-0: @204b bdun pa la byang chub sems dpa' de nyid sems can la snying rje skyed do //
T02D2504:204b-1: brgyad pa la de nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
T02D2504:204b-2: dgu pa la zag pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod do //
T02D2504:204b-3: bcu pa la chos kyi rgyal mtshan du dbang bskur ro //
T02D2504:204b-4: bcu pa'i chos kyi ye shes chen pos bcu gcig pa la bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed do //
T02D2504:204b-5: rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len pa la sogs pa'i bag la nyal rnams spong ngo //
T02D2504:204b-6: bcu gnyis pa la sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar
T02D2504:204b-7: mi shigs pa ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mthar
T02D2504:204b-8: phyin to // de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2504:204b-9: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D2504:204b-10: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2504:204b-11: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2504:204b-12: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis stong pa nyid
T02D2504:204b-13: dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
T02D2504:204b-14: dang 'dus ma byas pa dang de rnams ni gzung
T02D2504:204b-15: 'dzin du ma zhen par bde ba nyams su myong
T02D2504:204b-16: ngo // rjes las thob pa'i skabs su ni sbyin pa dang /
T02D2504:204b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po la spyod do //
T02D2504:204b-28: grangs nges pa ni 'og nas shes par bya'o //
T02D2504:204b-29: de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi lha rnams ni kun rdzob tu go rims nges ba'o //
T02D2504:204b-30: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams
T02D2504:204b-31: kyi rnam par gzhag pa las don dam pa'i rnal
T02D2504:204b-32: 'byor bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o /
T02D2504:204b-35: gzhan yang brjod par bya ba ni //
T02D2504:204b-36: rtsa ba'i bzhir gyur lha rnams kyi //
T02D2504:204b-37: kun rdzob ngag gi nges pa ni //
T02D2504:204b-38: cung zad bsdus te bdag gis bri //
T02D2504:204b-39: de la re zhig rnam par snang mdzad ni zhal bzhi bar nges te /
T02D2504:204b-40: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyar nges so //
T02D2504:204b-41: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni rtag ba la zhal gcig pa'o //
T02D2504:204b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' ni zhal gnyis pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2504:204b-43: rdo rje legs pa ni zhal re re dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2504:204b-44: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni bud med kyi chag lugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2504:204b-45: lcags kyu la sogs pa ni khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2504:205a-0: dris pa rnam par snang mdzad @205a * //
T02D2504:205a-1: ni ci'i phyir zhal bzhir nges she na /
T02D2504:205a-2: de ni rdo rje slob dpon la bsnyen ba kur ba ste de yang bum pa las /
T02D2504:205a-3: bde gshegs slob dpon dgyes pa'i phyir //
T02D2504:205a-4: rnam par snang mdzad phyogs bzhir gzigs //
T02D2504:205a-6: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa ni dam tshig
T02D2504:205a-7: gi phyag rgyar rig pa ma yin no zhe na
T02D2504:205a-8: / de ni gdul bya'i ngor bstan pa ste /
T02D2504:205a-9: de yang de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2504:205a-10: mu stegs pa la phan don du //
T02D2504:205a-11: sangs rgyas btsun po phyag rgyar bcas /
T02D2504:205a-13: de lta na ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D2504:205a-14: rnam par snang mdzad la zhal gzigs par mi rigs
T02D2504:205a-15: so zhe na de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D2504:205a-16: shes kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
T02D2504:205a-18: dper nas gzhi chen po las //
T02D2504:205a-19: rtsi shing la sogs 'byung ba bzhin //
T02D2504:205a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las //
T02D2504:205a-21: ye shes gzhan yang 'byung phyir ro //
T02D2504:205a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni zhal gnyis dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2504:205a-24: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa ni zhal gcig
T02D2504:205a-25: tu nges pa brjod de de ni gtso bo'i dbang
T02D2504:205a-26: du mdzad pa ste de yang 'brug sgra rgyas pa'i
T02D2504:205a-27: rtag pa las / thun mong pa ni ma yin pa'i //
T02D2504:205a-28: so so dag la zhal gnyis gzigs //
T02D2504:205a-29: thun mong gtso bo nyid gcig ste //
T02D2504:205a-30: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa //
T02D2504:205a-31: zhal gcig nges zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2504:205a-32: sgeg mo la sogs bud med kyi cha lugs 'dzin
T02D2504:205a-33: pa ni mos pa'i dbang du bstan pa ste de
T02D2504:205a-34: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud chen po las
T02D2504:205a-35: / sems can mos pa tha dad pas //
T02D2504:205a-36: sangs rgyas sku ni cir yang bstan //
T02D2504:205a-38: dris pa rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa ni
T02D2504:205a-39: khro bo'i cha lugs su 'dzin pa ji lta bu
T02D2504:205a-40: zhe na de ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2504:205a-42: dngos grub la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
T02D2504:205a-43: ste de ldem por bstan pa ste de yang 'jam
T02D2504:205a-45: nyon mongs bdud rnams tshar gcod pas //
T02D2504:205a-46: mchog gi dngos grub stsol bya'i phyir //
T02D2504:205a-47: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs ni //
T02D2504:205a-48: khro bo'i cha lugs kho nar nges //
T02D2504:205a-49: zhes gsungs te de bas na rgyal ba de dag
T02D2504:205a-50: ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dag las smos pas
T02D2504:205b-0: de lta bur rtogs na shin tu 'ang @205b dam
T02D2504:205b-1: tshig nyams pa'i phyir dmus long la 'o ma'i yon
T02D2504:205b-2: tan brjod pa lta bu ste lan brjod par 'os
T02D2504:205b-4: 'on kyang snying rje'i dbang gis cung zhig brjod pa'o //
T02D2504:205b-5: dris pa go rims nges pa gang yin de brjod
T02D2504:205b-6: de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis dang bral ba'i
T02D2504:205b-7: ye shes las de nyid gsal ba'i ngo bor gnas
T02D2504:205b-8: pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par mi 'byed pa dang /
T02D2504:205b-9: bden pa nyams su myong ba dang /
T02D2504:205b-10: 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rgyur gyur ba dang /
T02D2504:205b-11: de nyid ni kun rdzob mtshan ma rnams las ldog
T02D2504:205b-12: pa ni rim gyis ldog pa'i phyir gtso bo'i nges
T02D2504:205b-14: rang rang gi nges pa de dang des ni ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D2504:205b-15: sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ci rigs su sbyar
T02D2504:205b-16: te gzhan dag tu rgya cher bstan pas 'dir mangs
T02D2504:205b-17: kyis dogs nas ma byas so //
T02D2504:205b-18: grangs med pa ni phyogs snga ma ltar na ma tshang ba dang mi dgos pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2504:205b-19: phyi ma lta na ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D2504:205b-20: shes bzhi 'byung bas de nyid re re zhing yang
T02D2504:205b-21: yon tan gyi cha bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir
T02D2504:205b-22: dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa la ni phyi
T02D2504:205b-23: nang gi mchod pa dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa
T02D2504:205b-24: la sogs pa des chog pa'i phyir te de bas
T02D2504:205b-25: na rdo rje dbyings kyi lha rnams ni don dam
T02D2504:205b-26: par grangs dang go rims nges ba'o //
T02D2504:205b-27: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi
T02D2504:205b-28: rnam par gzhag pa las kun rdzob dang don dam
T02D2504:205b-29: gyi rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2504:205b-31: // / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par
T02D2504:205b-32: gzhag pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mu ti ta
T02D2504:205b-33: ko shas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2504:205b-36: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma ka ra barma dang /
